text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's talk podcast
calm
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 73 in today's
episode I have a new word for you
avid let's find out what it means and
how you can use it in your daily
conversation avid there are certain
activities that you take keen interest
in or you may have a strong desire to do
something the word of it basically means
to be very eager or interested in doing
something if you do something avidly you
do it with great enthusiasm when you are
avid about something it is usually in
reference to an activity which you
really enjoy doing for example someone
who talks only about sports is an avid
sports fan or someone maybe an avid
philatelist because he is interested in
collecting stamps from all over the
world it also means to have a strong
craving or agreed for something for
example a person can be avid for success
as the word avid describes someone's
enthusiasm or interest about something
it is an adjective
okay now that you know what avid means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example 1 ben's
avid ambition to succeed made him a
workaholic he wanted to gain quick
recognition in his office
example two
Mary is an avid listener of pop music
she spends a lot of money collecting pop
music albums example three Amanda is
very annoyed with her husband as he's an
avid late-night clubber and returns home
drunk every night example for the
grandparents were avid awaiting to see
their grandchildren since they moved
away from the city to their retirement
home two years back example 5 Kimberly
is avid about online shopping because
she feels that it saves her time and
money example 6 George is an avid rock
climber and indulges in this adventure
at least twice a year
example 7 Juliet is an avid cook she
always experiments making new dishes
with the help of her cookery book
example eight Richard is an avid
Internet user he often sits late at
night surfing for information on the net
example nine lisa has always been an
avid reader on psychology dating and
relationships she often advises her
friends when they face issues in their
personal relationships that's the end of
today's episode have you ever been avid
about something kindly share your
experiences in the comment box below
this video thank you for watching us do
watch all the episodes of daily video
vocabulary to make your English
communication skills better do subscribe
to our Channel and stay updated with all
the latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with a new word or an idiom
till then
bye and take care
